p: Viruses that cause infection after HCT can be classified as latent or “episodic” in nature, with the latter acquired typically after exposure rather than as a result of a reactivation event. 6 In the early post-transplant period herpes simplex virus (HSV) reactivation was the most frequent viral infection both in allo-HCT and auto-HCT patients. 4, 5 Overall, 8% of allo-HCT patient died primarily due to infections and 24% of these infections were viral. 4 In auto-HCT patients deaths due to infections were episodic. 5
